IPv4Address.description: This type describes an IPv4 address.
IPv4Address.longDescription: This type shall describe an IPv4 address assigned to an interface.

IPv6Address.description: This type describes an IPv6 address.
IPv6Address.longDescription: This type shall describe an IPv6 address assigned to an interface.

IPv6GatewayStaticAddress.description: This type represents a single IPv6 static address to be assigned on a network interface.
IPv6GatewayStaticAddress.longDescription: This type shall represent a single IPv6 static address to be assigned on a network interface.

IPv6StaticAddress.description: This type represents a single IPv6 static address to be assigned on a network interface.
IPv6StaticAddress.longDescription: This type shall represent a single IPv6 static address to be assigned on a network interface.

title: #IPAddresses
